official_title: A bill to designate the reservoir created by Trinity Dam in the Central Valley project, California, as "Trinity Lake".

summary.text: Redesignates Clair Engle Lake, the reservoir created by Trinity Dam in the Central Valley project, California, as Trinity Lake.
